original_text:
Elvis Frog in Vegas
Il personaggio di Elvis Presley è entrato anche nel mondo delle slot machine: ne esistono diverse, infatti, che vedono come protagonista il Re del Rock! La software house BGaming però ci offre una versione molto originale: troviamo Elvis non con le sue sembianze ma in versione rana canterina, ovviamente con l’immancabile ciuffo con la brillantina e gli abiti luccicanti.
Elvis Frog in Vegas si muove nella città delle luci, in un tripudio di neon e colori sgargianti, per un effetto grafico di sicuro impatto e molto divertente.
La schermata iniziale ci accoglie con l’immagine delle rana-Elvis in primo piano e sullo sfondo le luci colorate di Las Vegas; stesso sfondo anche per la schermata di gioco, con i rulli disegnati in maniera abbastanza essenziale.
La BGaming ci ha abituati a prodotti curati dal punto di vista grafico, ma senza eccessi: se cercate una slot machine con effetti speciali spettacolari o animazioni tridimensionali, siete nel posto sbagliato, ma non temete, Elvis Frog in Vegas vi riserva comunque delle piacevoli soprese!
Caratteristiche principali della slot machine
Elvis Frog in Vegas è una slot machine che può essere giocata sia dal computer, sia da tutti i dispositivi mobili, tablet e smartphone, sia iOS sia Windows e Android, facendo le vostre scommesse a partire da 2,50 fino a 25 monete per ciascun giro.
Dal punto di vista della struttura, Elvis Frog in Vegas è molto classica, prevedendo cinque rulli, tre righe e 25 linee di pagamento.
La vincita massima che potrete ottenere con questa slot di casa BGaming è pari a 2.500 volte l’importo della vostra puntata.
La volatilità di Elvis Frog in Vegas è media, il che significa che potrete vincere con una discreta frequenza ma che per mettere le mani su premi di un certo valore dovrete faticare un pochino.
Per quanto riguarda il ritorno teorico al giocatore (return to player o RTP), ci attestiamo al 94%, niente di particolarmente entusiasmante.
Simboli e funzionalità speciali di Elvis Frog in Vegas
Come spesso accade, i simboli in Elvis Frog in Vegas si dividono in tematici e non, con questi ultimi rappresentati dai numeri e dalle lettere delle carte da poker.
I simboli tematici sono quelli legati al mondo della musica e di Las Vegas: abbiamo una stella, un microfono “old style!, una macchina di lusso di colore fuxia, una affascinante ballerina ranocchia e ovviamente l’immancabile Elvis Frog!
I simboli speciali sono tre: Elvis Frog è il Wild del gioco, regala le vincite più sostanziose e ha funzione di jolly; la stella è invece lo Scatter, appare solo sui rulli 1, 3 e 5 e permette di accedere alla funzione Free Spins; la moneta d’oro infine compare sia durante il gioco base che nei giri gratuiti e offre la possibili di competere per uno dei tre jackpot fissi!

Review: Elvis Frog in Vegas

The iconic Elvis Presley has made his way into the world of slot machines, with numerous titles showcasing the King of Rock! But BGaming has offered a refreshingly unique take with Elvis Frog in Vegas, featuring a crooning amphibian donning the signature quiff and flashy attire in the City of Lights amidst an array of neon and bold hues for a dazzling visual impact and loads of entertainment.

The intro screen greets the player with a close-up of frog-Elvis against a Las Vegas backdrop, with the same background carried over onto the game screen with the reels boldly yet simplistically designed. BGaming has built a reputation for creating visually impressive games, though not overly gimmicky. If you're seeking slots with enormous special effects or 3D animations, look elsewhere, but rest assured Elvis Frog in Vegas still has plenty of delightful surprises in store!

Key features of Elvis Frog in Vegas
Elvis Frog in Vegas works on both desktop and mobile devices, including tablets and smartphones, and is compatible with iOS, Windows, and Android, while bets start from 2.50 up to 25 coins per spin.

Structurally, Elvis Frog in Vegas is quite standard, offering five reels, three rows, and 25 paylines, while maximum wins can reach 2,500 times the bet amount.

Elvis Frog in Vegas has medium volatility, which means players can expect to win relatively frequently but will have to work harder to snag larger payouts. The return to player (RTP) rate is average at 94%.

Symbols and special features in Elvis Frog in Vegas
As with most slots, symbols in Elvis Frog in Vegas can be split into thematic and generic categories, with the latter comprising the numbers and alphabets representing poker cards. Thematic symbols are closely linked to music and Las Vegas, including a star, an "old-style" microphone, a pink luxury car, a charming frog dancer, and, of course, Elvis Frog himself!

There are three special symbols in Elvis Frog in Vegas: Elvis Frog is the game's wild symbol, offering the most substantial payouts while also acting as a wild card. The star, on the other hand, is the scatter symbol; landing on reels 1, 3, and 5 triggers the Free Spins mode. The gold coin appears during both base and free spins, allowing players to compete for one of three fixed jackpots!

Review:
 
Gameplay Mechanics

Elvis Frog in Vegas offers a classic slot game experience, with five reels, three rows, and 25 paylines. The game works on both desktop and mobile devices, with bets starting from 2.50 up to 25 coins per spin. Maximum wins can reach 2,500 times the bet amount.

Theme

Elvis Frog in Vegas features a unique theme of a crooning amphibian donning the signature quiff and flashy attire in the City of Lights amidst an array of neon and bold hues for a dazzling visual impact and loads of entertainment. The design is visually impressive yet not overly gimmicky.

Special Symbols and Features

Thematic symbols in Elvis Frog in Vegas are closely linked to music and Las Vegas, including an 'old-style' microphone, a pink luxury car, and Elvis Frog himself. There are also three special symbols, with Elvis Frog as the game's wild symbol, the star as the scatter symbol, and the gold coin allowing players to compete for one of three fixed jackpots. Landing three stars on reels 1, 3, and 5 triggers the Free Spins mode.

Jackpot System

Elvis Frog in Vegas offers players the chance to compete for one of three fixed jackpots, which can be won by landing gold coin symbols on the reels during either the base game or the free spins mode. The three jackpots consist of the Mini, Minor, and Major, with the latter offering the highest payout. The jackpot system adds an extra exciting element to the game and provides the potential for significant payouts.

Winning Potential and RTP

Elvis Frog in Vegas has medium volatility, which means players can expect to win relatively frequently but will have to work harder to snag larger payouts. The return to player (RTP) rate is average at 94%. The game offers a maximum win of 2,500 times the bet amount, which provides players with significant winning potential. Overall, Elvis Frog in Vegas offers a balanced and enjoyable slot game experience.

The iconic Elvis Presley has made his way into the world of slot machines, with numerous titles showcasing the King of Rock! BGaming has built a reputation for creating visually impressive games, though not overly gimmicky. If you're seeking slots with enormous special effects or 3D animations, look elsewhere, but rest assured Elvis Frog in Vegas still has plenty of delightful surprises in store!

Key features of Elvis Frog in Vegas
Elvis Frog in Vegas works on both desktop and mobile devices, including tablets and smartphones, and is compatible with iOS, Windows, and Android, while bets start from 2.50 up to 25 coins per spin.

Structurally, Elvis Frog in Vegas is quite standard, offering five reels, three rows, and 25 paylines, while maximum wins can reach 2,500 times the bet amount.

Elvis Frog in Vegas has medium volatility, which means players can expect to win relatively frequently but will have to work harder to snag larger payouts. The return to player (RTP) rate is average at 94%.

Symbols and special features in Elvis Frog in Vegas
As with most slots, symbols in Elvis Frog in Vegas can be split into thematic and generic categories, with the latter comprising the numbers and alphabets representing poker cards. Thematic symbols are closely linked to music and Las Vegas, including a star, an "old-style" microphone, a pink luxury car, a charming frog dancer, and, of course, Elvis Frog himself!

There are three special symbols in Elvis Frog in Vegas: Elvis Frog is the game's wild symbol, offering the most substantial payouts while also acting as a wild card. The star, on the other hand, is the scatter symbol; landing on reels 1, 3, and 5 triggers the Free Spins mode. The gold coin appears during both base and free spins, allowing players to compete for one of three fixed jackpots!
